roleset.name: not the norm
roleset.note: UNUSUAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from unusual.01-j)

role.descr: attributive: entity arg1 is unusual for

example.name: arg1
example.text: Furthermore , the excuses for transferring blame are more and more *RNR*-1, and the incidents of transferring blame are more and more [unusual]-1 . So , we can see how the transfer of blame becomes an environment .

example.name: both args
example.text: I wish I could tell you this is unusual for Costa Rica.
